h1_title: Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough
h2_title: How to Access Purple Cloud Mountain
content: The first time you can find the Venom Daoist, he'll be hiding in the Upper Hollow of the major Webbed Hollow region. You can find it by circling the first area to the right, dropping down a hole to a slightly lower level, and fighting your way through tunnels full of hanging cocoons to reach the Pools of Shattered Jade Shrine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_4_Secret-Purple_Cloud_Mountain_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'How to Access Purple Cloud Mountain'.
The content is as follows:
The first time you can find the Venom Daoist, he'll be hiding in the Upper Hollow of the major Webbed Hollow region. You can find it by circling the first area to the right, dropping down a hole to a slightly lower level, and fighting your way through tunnels full of hanging cocoons to reach the Pools of Shattered Jade Shrine.
